text.text: Knowing so much about the science of nature is satisfying.
It is even better when people stand in lines hoping to find a... chemical solution to their problems.
That solution is nothing more than a simple poison, which only YOU can provide.
You couldn't bring the pre-made poisons because of the tavern security checking everyone at the entrance.
But you thought in advance and brought the poison chemicals a few days prior, hiding them at the places that you can't remember, whoops.
The poison also has to be made in perfect glassware.
Find the specific flasks that will suit your needs.
Mix in the flasks the poison chemicals and water and the poison is ready to be served, cheers!
You could find use in these poisons as well, but you'd rather exchange most of them for money.
Scientists just aren't paid enough these days!
Earn at least 15 gold, selling poisons!
